turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I want to order a drink from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I can help with that. Do you know the location will is for

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need it to be at the Starbucks in studio city.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok What can I get you today

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok will you need milk, skin milk, half and half, or no creamer?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I neeed two of those to come with regular milk. Then the other two to come with skin milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, and will these be hot or cold brew?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need them all to be hot

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, will yo need to order anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes just one onion bagel with cream cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, 4 grande coffees, 2 with skin milk and 2 with regular and a onion bagel with cream creese comes to 12.50. Will you be paying cash or credit

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: alright then your order shoudl be ready for pick up in 20mins from the Studio city locaiton
